summary:
### February 2025 Summary for scaffold-eth/buidlguidl-v3

- **Feature Improvement**: Merged PR #122 implemented the use of Ponder to fetch data for the `/admin/cohorts` page, enhancing data retrieval capabilities.
- **Open Issue**: Issue #123 was raised regarding the failure to fetch new cohort withdrawals in the `/activity` endpoint, indicating a potential regression from a previous commit.
- **Overall Activity**: Limited activity this month with only one merged PR and one open issue, suggesting a focus on refining existing features rather than introducing new ones.

topIssues.title: New cohort withdrawals are not getting fetched in /activity

topPRs.title: Use Ponder to get info on /admin/cohorts page
